```pddl
[
  '(:action process_coconut
    :parameters (?p - person ?c - coconut ?t - tool ?r - rack ?g - glass)
    :precondition (and 
                    (available ?p)
                    (on ?c ?r)
                    (not (drained ?c))
                    (or (wrapped ?c) (has_casing ?c) (broken ?c))
                    (or (knife ?t) (sharp ?t) (tool ?t))
                    (empty ?g)
                  )
    :effect (and 
              (peeled ?c)
              (not (wrapped ?c))
            )
  )',
  '(:action wrap
    :parameters (?p - person ?item - object ?wrapper - object)
    :precondition (and
                    (not (wrapped ?item))
                    (clean ?wrapper)
                  )
    :effect (and
              (wrapped ?item)
              (not (clean ?wrapper))
            )
  )',
  '(:action break
    :parameters (?p - person ?obj - object ?tool - tool)
    :precondition (and 
                    (not (broken ?obj))
                    (in_hand ?tool)
                  )
    :effect (and 
              (broken ?obj)
              (not (wrapped ?obj))
            )
  )'
]
```
